abstract:
Extract from Ephraim Unell, Not The Most Powerful Argument About the Meaning of Free Exercise: Congressional Power, Facial Review, and why Rosenkranz Subjects Theory Does Not Support Smith 1 n.*, 42 n.161 (2012) (unpublished manuscript) (on file with author), citing Tillman & Tillman's A Fragment on Shall and May.
[August 12, 2013]
title: Extract from Ephraim Unell, Not The Most Powerful Argument About the Meaning of Free Exercise: Congressional Power, Facial Review, and why Rosenkranz Subjects Theory Does Not Support Smith (2012) (unpublished manuscript), citing Tillman & Tillman's A Fragment on Shall and May
subject: law
